name: Pico Checkmate
description:
A simple, cute retro version of classic Chess made in Pico-8. Full implementation of the Chess rules(*) with a juicy interface and some basic AI to play against. Created as part of the Chess Jam 2018. Lexaloffle thread is here.

* Note: Game will not recognize draw by Threefold repetition

Instructions
  • You might need to click the window to gain focus
  • Use the cursor keys to move the cursor
  • Use the X, M or V  key to select
  • Use the Z, M or C key to cancel
